name: Uralis
declaringWar: Your cities are a shadow of what could be...
attacked: You can decleare war all you want, it means nothing to us!
defeated: The Golden Capital has fallen! What dark days...
introduction: Hello! Welcome to the Golden Capital of the world, Would you like to join us?
tradeRequest: Hey, Would you like some riches?

name: Urun-Dor
declaringWar: What is your plan?
attacked: What? This is outrageous..!
defeated: Before i go, please take care of my dogs.
introduction: Greetings! I am Harren! Leader of the great Urun-Dor
tradeRequest: Hey, Could i have some things please?
uniques: [+2 Production] from all [Culture] buildings <while the empire is happy>

name: The Empire
declaringWar: I never wanted this to happen! But war is needed
attacked: Really? you must be a brave person...
defeated: No... This cannot be!
introduction: Greetings, I am Gabriel, the leader of this here empire.
uniques: When defeating a [Wounded] unit, earn [30] Gold and recruit it

name: VividVale
declaringWar: I'm sorry, but you threaten the peace and balance of this world.
attacked: Look at that leader with war declaration, nice job, mate. Show how evil you are!
defeated: VividVale has collapsed, we will respect you if you respect us...
introduction: Welcome! We are VividVale and we hope for many allies.

name: Costazmacia
declaringWar: One day, Humanity will be united again. But you're in my way...
attacked: War..? I never wanted to make you fall.
defeated: Costazmacia has fallen, Humanity will be united one day... It's a shame it won't be our Monarchy.
introduction: Hey! It's cold outside, how about you come inside and talk about your people to me.
uniques: [+1 Gold, +2 Food] per [5] population [in all cities] <with [Fish]>

civilopediaText.text: Costazmacia started in around 6000 BC, before the formation of all Costi civilisations. Once the empire 'collapsed' many tribes, clans and kingdoms were created from different Costazmacian territories.

In 270 BC, Costazmacia had regained a good number of territories from the north over time. Eventually, Costazmacia had been caught up into constant raids by Nordaz axemen, mostly during 120 BC which stopped their growth for some time, until Nordaz had finally been taken down by Costazmacia and other kingdoms from the west around 800 AD.

Growth in Costazmacia continued steadily during that point in time, after a small group named The Jarrids had begun invading and taking land, south of Costazmacia, they decided to step in and interfere with the southern kingdoms around The Jarrids. After Lannen had discovered this, he quickly regrouped his soldiers from a nearby kingdom to attack the Costazmaci armies by surprise. After Lannens death in 1586 AD, Costazmacia invaded the unstablelised empire in 1589 AD.

After Costazmacia's discovery of niter and muskets in 1667 AD, Some kingdoms and other nations across the world had begun trading with Costazmacia to have muskets, as they were proven useful. In 1724 AD, new lands to the east had been discovered, and many tribes had also been discovered too, the Motu and Nami archipelagos had also been discovered to the south west soon afterwards in 1745 AD. Interaction between Costazmacia had been mostly peaceful with the tribes.

During 1732 AD, a war between had been declared between Costazmacia and Prukaz over land disputes over a harbour in the north, which also had caused some conflict between their colonists in the Wouleto Continent. during one of these battles between colonists during the war, one tribesperson had been accidentally shot, which had caused chaos and dragged some nearby tribes into the conflict, with tribes attacking anyone who had resembled Costazmaci or Prukaz soldiers. Costazmacia would win the war in 1730 AD.

name: Alihn Ahn
startIntroPart1: Alihn Ahn is a nation known for it's intensity of riches, and for their love of it, begining on the desert, is where their new story begins
startIntroPart2: Will you lead Alihn Ahn to riches, Can you build a civilisation that can stand against the test of time?
declaringWar: I've had enough of looking at your poor cities!
attacked: Why should this be!? Our riches will blind you!
defeated: Hmm! What now? want to laugh as you bring everything away..?
introduction: Oh hello! Have you come to my shining cities for guidance?
tradeRequest: I have waited ages to ask you this!!
uniques: May buy [All] units with [Culture] [in all cities]

name: Fortoulen
startIntroPart1: Fortoulen, The great and mysterious north, filled with beautiful jungles and forest. Many know not of the bloodshed between the other southern tribes and empires. but with your mind, Loneltili, Fortoulen shall thrive
startIntroPart2: Oh Loneltili, can you defend against the southern empires? Can you build a civilisation that can stand against the test of time?
declaringWar: War is the only way we can have peace, accept our pain!
attacked: We are not strangers to war, you have failed to think. Now we shall turn your men around...
defeated: I should have known to leave you alone. And now, i'm an alone wanderer.
introduction: Hello Wanderer! We come from far and wide to greet you to our society, for we are Fortoulen!
tradeRequest: We want to know about you, friend, for we are a keen society.

name: Grendale
startIntroPart1: Vast lush land... This is a sign that Grenland is here. Grendale, starting off as a colony that came from south Costi rose to the top for it's fertile home. Grendale also allowed independance for VividVale, which eventually made Grendale unpopular and 'Uncultured', but who can save Grendale from this? And this is where Edmerl came in to power
startIntroPart2: Will you bring Grendale back to the spotlight? Can you build a civilization that can stand the test of time?
declaringWar: Your intent for violence has forced us to go to war!
attacked: Grendale will not surrender to you, no matter how hard you try!
defeated: All i wanted to do was bring Grendale strength, now Grendale will be forgotten.
introduction: Hello and welcome to Grendale! And I am Edmerl, President of this cultured nation!
tradeRequest: As president Edmerl, I Suggest a humble delegation

name: Iroztia
startIntroPart1: Iroztia, located in South Costi is a large developed monarchy known for its peaceful approach to conflict, as long as Iroztia has many peaceful neighbours, Iroztia will rise for power.
startIntroPart2: Will you develop a great Society under your great reign? Will you create a civilisation that can stand the test of time?
declaringWar: We are fed up will every word you make! I won't care about having to destroy your society...
attacked: Hm!? Your soldiers will fall before they ever stand upon our land!
defeated: My monarchy... My... Everything...
introduction: Hello! Who must you be? I am the great Ozten. Ozten the Great!
tradeRequest: Ozten and my people are willing to share, how about ye?

name: Motunai
startIntroPart1: The people of Motunai were well known in the Western Archipelago for its many inhabitants living amoung islands, which the tribe owned around one hundred and more islands at its time, with one of the tribes greatest chieftains, Ame'nee
startIntroPart2: The people of Motunai yearn for you attention, Ame'nee. Can you build a civilisation that can stand the test of time?
declaringWar: First, we will have your islands. Next, your people!
attacked: So you want to take us? We are united throughout every island around us...
defeated: Well... This turned out badly...
introduction: Oooooo, Visitors..! May i show you around on our palm wood boats?
tradeRequest: Here, lets trade. You could also rest by the water if you're tired.
uniques: [+2 Gold] from every [Water] <starting from the [Discovery Era]>

name: The Jarrids
startIntroPart1: Lannen, once starting his life around rural towns inbetween two great kingdoms. He rose to power against everyone against him, conquering a great amount of land during his lifetime. only for the Jarrids to collaspe, within only a couple years after his death.
startIntroPart2: Lannen, can you build a civilisation that can stand the test of time?
declaringWar: To battle! You will see our might! for God is with us...
attacked: Wha- huh!? why do you torment us only now..?
defeated: My reign comes to an end... time goes so quick...
introduction: Heh... I am Lannen, i have been chosen by my people to rule- okay, long story short, its nice to meet you!
tradeRequest: So uh, are you up for a deal, friend?
uniques: [+25]% Production when constructing [Melee] units [in all cities] <when at war>

name: Noustekim
startIntroPart1: Noustekim is a powerful tribe, conquering most of their enemies without mercy.
startIntroPart2: Noustekim is strong, but it is threatened. Zamitzi, can you build a civilisation that can stand the test of time?
declaringWar: I always knew we would go to war at some point. Prepare for collapse!
attacked: Hahaha! You? You couldn't hurt a small city-state if you tried!
defeated: I was wrong to fight you, but i know your people will suffer soon, VERY SOON!
introduction: Welcome to Noustekim lands. Just make sure not to get in my way.
hateHello: Are you trying to say something?
tradeRequest: It seems you have a reason to exist after all...

name: Prukaz
startIntroPart1: Prukaz is one of the lesser known civilisations on the Costi Continent, prukaz is a nation that has been defending itself and succedding everytime. Prukaz has potential, and thanks to you, Prukaz may achieve greatness.
startIntroPart2: Can you bring Prukazia greatness? Can you create a civilisation that can stand the test of time?
declaringWar: War could bring Prukaz greatness or collapse, I pray it is not the former...
attacked: Your nation has nothing on us, and i mean this by spirit..!
defeated: With all this war... It was only a matter of time until we fell to you. Treat us well...
introduction: I am Canzil, the third king of Prukazia. Care for lunch?
tradeRequest: Let's just respect our relation over some deals, and maybe lunch?

name: Nordaz
startIntroPart1: Nordaz is a kingdom in the north of Costi, with the Axemen that brought fear in the north. During most of the kingdom's lifetime, it was spent raiding nearby villages and gaining riches and power from it. Until the wars against Costazmacia began, where the Nordaz tried and failed to stop the invasion, putting an end to the fear and violence of the north.
startIntroPart2: Nordaz may have lived an unfortunate lifespan, but you could change this, for the better of Nordaz. Could you build a civilisation that can stant the test of time?
declaringWar: To the battlefields! Where this war will earn us victory of the North!
attacked: My my, what mistake you have made. We will burn you to the ground..!
defeated: Well, i guess we we're too aggressive in the end... My apologies for doing what i had been taught to do...
introduction: I am Frederick! Axeman and king of Nordaz; I hope that i dont accidentally attack ya in the future.
hateHello: Do you mind? I am trying to get some rest over here, hurry up..!
tradeRequest: I am sure we can become rich with this deal (trust).

name: A'Anya
declaringWar: Our people will never bow down to you!
attacked: When will people leave is alone..?
defeated: This isn't victory, this is enslavement...

name: Ceylihn
declaringWar: All you do is take, it's my turn to take!
attacked: Ugh... You suck
defeated: My people will not stand for this!

name: Toletil
declaringWar: Your fall will be quick!
attacked: War? Our people will enjoy this..!
defeated: Even if we have fallen... our city-state will thrive.

name: Zolsk
declaringWar: For our might or yours, war has to be done...
attacked: We may not be powerful, but atleast we have the spirit..!
defeated: Your stronger than i thought...

name: Albenpal
declaringWar: Your people are ruining our way of life!
attacked: No! You cannot do this, what have we ever done to you?
defeated: Maybe later, we will have peace through citisenship..?

name: Braritzall
declaringWar: We will form our great empire if you fail too.
attacked: You will pay...
defeated: No, No, This cant be...

name: Ene'hai'te
declaringWar: Ha Ha! To war!
attacked: So be it! We never wanted you here anyways.
defeated: I could say this for everyone: WE DON'T WANT THIS!

name: Rhen√üier
declaringWar: As king of this land, I order for your surrender.
attacked: Oh... So now we are at war?
defeated: I weep as we become one of the low-states...

name: Touleki
declaringWar: You have fallen into our trap!
attacked: You, and your society will regret this..!
defeated: Leave me alone, you've done enough...

name: Sapire
declaringWar: For freedom!
attacked: We never wanted to resort to violence.
defeated: Chained, and entire society just like that...

name: Cazzieka
declaringWar: Now you have crossed the line, and that line is our borders!
attacked: Fool! We will tear you apart!
defeated: Defeated?? What a lair! Get outta my sight..!

name: Sanhir
declaringWar: God will guide us, and send a fire to burn down your people...
attacked: Sanhir, our nations will not fall!
defeated: Sanhir has been put to the grave. Leave me alone, I need to pray now...

name: Northern Village
declaringWar: We must go to war!
attacked: All right, we will defend with our lives..!
defeated: We shall be lead by you now...

name: Desert Settlement
declaringWar: We must go to war!
attacked: All right, we will defend with our lives..!
defeated: We shall be lead by you now...

name: Forest Town
declaringWar: We must go to war!
attacked: All right, we will defend with our lives..!
defeated: We shall be lead by you now...
